title: Electric field due to a dipole

content.question: The electric field at the origin due to the electric dipole has a magnitude of <math alttext="E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following correctly expresses the magnitude and direction of the electric field at point <math alttext="N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="five ninths E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>E</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, to the right
<math alttext="five ninths E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>E</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, to the left
<math alttext="four ninths E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>E</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, to the right
<math alttext="four ninths E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>E</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, to the left

content.answer: <math alttext="four ninths E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>E</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, to the left

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
